Digital Spy quizzed Jackman on the matter (the scene he picks is not what you'd expect) and asked him for the one piece of advice he'd pass along to his successor."Start training six months out. I got the part literally as they were filming. Bryan Singer said, 'How long do you need to get into shape?' 'Three weeks?' If you look at the film carefully there's quite a transformation."So... brace yourself for more gym time, Tom Hardy?Pan opens in cinemas on October 16.
